api_list.name: Basic endpoint
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can access the results for the following games: Powerball, MegaMillions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://major-us-lotteries.p.rapidapi.com/lotteries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "major-us-lotteries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://major-us-lotteries.p.rapidapi.com/lotteries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "major-us-lotteries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
